action.action-desc: Mr. Meuser introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize the acquisition and installation of gunshot detection systems under the matching grant program for school security.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the 21st Century School Protection Act.

section.header: Acquisition and installation of gunshot detection systems under the matching grant program for school security
